INSERT INTO IBIMS112B ( CNSB_DCD /* 협의체구분코드 */ , CNSB_SQ , RSLTN_YR /* 결의년도 */ , SN /* 일련번호 */ , DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , RGST_DT /* 등록일자 */ , DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원번호 */ , HND_TMNL_NO /* 조작단말기번호 */ , HND_TR_ID /* 조작거래ID */ , GUID /* GUID */ ) VALUES
( #{item.cnsbDcd} /* 협의체구분코드 */ , #{item.sn} /* 일련번호 */ , #{item.rsltnYr} /* 결의년도 */ , #{index}+1 , #{item.dealNo} /* 딜번호 */ , #{item.mtrDcd} /* 안건구분코드 */ , #{item.jdgmDcd} /* 심사구분코드 */ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') /* 등록일자 */ , 'N' /* 삭제여부 */ , SYSDATE /* 조작상세일시 */ , #{item.hndEmpno} /* 조작사원번호 */ , #{item.hndTmnlNo} /* 조작단말기번호 */ , #{item.hndTrId} /* 조작거래ID */ , #{item.guid} /* GUID */ )
mapper.select: SELECT A.DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , A.SN /* 일련번호 */ , B.MTR_NM /* 안건명 */ , A.JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R014' AND CD_VL_ID = A.JDGM_DCD ) AS JDGM_DCD_NM , A.MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'L007' AND CD_VL_ID = A.MTR_DCD ) AS MTR_DCD_NM , B.DPRT_CD /* 부서코드 */ , ( SELECT MAX(DPRT_NM) FROM IBIMS003B WHERE DPRT_CD = B.DPRT_CD ) AS DPRT_NM , B.CHRR_EMPNO /* 담당자사원번호 */ , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.CHRR_EMPNO ) AS CHRG_P_ENM , B.OWN_P_ENO /* 심사역사번 */ , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.OWN_P_ENO ) AS OWN_P_ENM FROM IBIMS112B A LEFT OUTER JOIN IBIMS103B B ON A.DEAL_NO = B.DEAL_NO AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD AND A.JDGM_DCD = B.JDGM_DCD WHERE A.CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND A.CNSB_SQ = #{sn} AND A.RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} AND B.LAST_YN = 'Y'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IBIMS112B WHERE 1=1 AND CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} /* 협의체구분코드 */ AND CNSB_SQ = #{sn} /* 협의체순번 */ AND RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} /* 결의년도 */ /* 일련번호 */
mapper.select: SELECT A.CNSB_DCD /* 협의체구분코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I008' AND CD_VL_ID = A.CNSB_DCD ) AS CNSB_DCD_NM , A.RSLTN_YR /* 결의년도 */ , A.CNSB_SQ /* 협의체순번 */ , A.SN /* 일련번호 */ , A.DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , A.MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , A.JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , B.MTR_NM /* 안건명 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I027' AND CD_VL_ID = B.PTFD_CRRY_CD )||' ('|| B.PTFD_CRRY_CD || ')' AS PTFD_CRRY_CD_NM , B.PTFD_AMT /* 부의금액 */ , C.CNSB_OPN_DT /* 협의체개최일자 */ , C.CNSB_OPN_TM /* 협의체개최시각 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'D010' AND CD_VL_ID = B.DPRT_CD ) ||' ('|| B.DPRT_CD || ')' AS DPRT_NM , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.CHRR_EMPNO )|| ' ('|| B.CHRR_EMPNO || ')' AS CHRG_P_ENM , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.OWN_P_ENO ) || ' (' || B.OWN_P_ENO || ')' AS OWN_P_ENM , B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD /* 안건진행상태구분코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I011' AND CD_VL_ID = B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD ) AS MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD_NM FROM IBIMS112B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS103B B ON A.DEAL_NO = B.DEAL_NO AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD AND A.JDGM_DCD = B.JDGM_DCD AND B.LAST_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN IBIMS111B C ON A.CNSB_DCD = C.CNSB_DCD AND A.CNSB_SQ = C.SN AND A.RSLTN_YR = C.RSLTN_YR WHERE A.CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND A.RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} AND A.CNSB_SQ = #{cnsbSq} AND B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD >= 304

SELECT B.DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , B.MTR_NM /* 안건명 */ , B.MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , B.JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R014' AND CD_VL_ID = B.JDGM_DCD ) AS JDGM_DCD_NM , B.PTFD_CRRY_CD /* 부의통화코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I027' AND CD_VL_ID = B.PTFD_CRRY_CD ) || ' (' || B.PTFD_CRRY_CD || ')' AS PTFD_CRRY_CD_NM , B.PTFD_AMT /* 부의금액 */ , B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD /* 안건진행상태구분코드 */ , CASE WHEN B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '304' THEN '' ELSE ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I011' AND CD_VL_ID = B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD ) END AS MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD_NM , NVL(A.APVL_AMT, '') AS APVL_AMT /* 승인금액 */ , NVL(A.SDN_CNDT_F, '') AS SDN_CNDT_F /* 셀다운조건여부 */ , NVL(A.SDN_CNDT_CTNS, '') AS SDN_CNDT_CTNS /* 셀다운조건의견 */ , NVL(A.ETC_CNDT_F, '') AS ETC_CNDT_F /* 기타조건여부 */ , NVL(A.ETC_CNDT_CTNS, '') AS ETC_CNDT_CTNS /* 기타조건의견 */ , B.RISK_RCG_NO /* 리스크승인번호 */ , C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD /* 결의결과코드 */ , NVL(( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R025' AND CD_VL_ID = C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD ), '') AS RSLTN_RSLT_CD_NM , A.SN , A.CNSB_DCD , A.CNSB_SQ FROM IBIMS112B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS103B B ON A.DEAL_NO = B.DEAL_NO AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD AND A.JDGM_DCD = B.JDGM_DCD AND B.LAST_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '307' THEN '4' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '308' THEN '2' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '309' AND ETC_CNDT_F = 'N' THEN '1' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '309' AND ETC_CNDT_F = 'Y' THEN '3' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '306' THEN '5' ELSE '' END AS RSLTN_RSLT_CD , CNSB_DCD , CNSB_SQ , RSLTN_YR , SN FROM IBIMS112B ) C ON A.CNSB_DCD = C.CNSB_DCD AND A.CNSB_SQ = C.CNSB_SQ AND A.RSLTN_YR = C.RSLTN_YR AND A.SN = C.SN WHERE A.CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND A.CNSB_SQ = #{cnsbSq} AND A.RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} AND A.SN = #{sn}

SELECT s112b.CNSB_DCD /* 협의체구분코드 */ , s112b.CNSB_SQ /* 협의체순번 */ , s112b.RSLTN_YR /* 결의년도 */ , s112b.SN /* 일련번호(순서정보) */ , s112b.DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , s112b.MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , s112b.JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , s112b.RGST_DT /* 등록일자 */ , s112b.SDN_CNDT_F /* 셀다운조건여부 */ , s112b.SDN_CNDT_CTNS /* 셀다운조건의견 */ , s112b.ETC_CNDT_F /* 기타조건여부 */ , s112b.ETC_CNDT_CTNS /* 기타조건의견 */ , s112b.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD /* 안건진행상태구분코드 */ , s112b.APVL_AMT /* 승인금액 */ , s112b.APVL_DT /* 승인일자 */ , s112b.DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , s112b.HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , s112b.HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원번호 */ , s112b.HND_TMNL_NO /* 조작단말기번호 */ , s112b.HND_TR_ID /* 조작거래ID */ , s112b.GUID /* GUID */ , IBIMS103B.CHRR_EMPNO AS CHRG_P_ENO , (SELECT A.EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B A WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMPNO=IBIMS103B.CHRR_EMPNO ) AS CHRG_P_ENM , IBIMS103B.OWN_P_ENO AS OWN_P_ENO , (SELECT B.EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B B WHERE 1=1 AND B.EMPNO=IBIMS103B.OWN_P_ENO ) AS OWN_P_ENM FROM (SELECT CNSB_DCD ,CNSB_SQ ,RSLTN_YR ,SN ,DEAL_NO ,MTR_DCD ,JDGM_DCD ,RGST_DT ,SDN_CNDT_F ,SDN_CNDT_CTNS ,ETC_CNDT_F ,ETC_CNDT_CTNS ,MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD ,APVL_DT ,APVL_AMT ,DEL_YN ,HND_DETL_DTM ,HND_EMPNO ,HND_TMNL_NO ,HND_TR_ID ,GUID ,RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY DEAL_NO, MTR_DCD, JDGM_DCD, CNSB_DCD ORDER BY DECODE(MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD,'308',1,'309',1,2) ASC, RSLTN_YR DESC, TO_NUMBER(CNSB_SQ) DESC, TO_NUMBER(SN) DESC) AS RK FROM IBIMS112B WHERE DEL_YN='N' ) s112b , IBIMS103B WHERE 1=1 AND s112b.DEAL_NO = #{dealNo} AND s112b.MTR_DCD = #{mtrDcd} AND s112b.JDGM_DCD = #{jdgmDcd} AND s112b.DEAL_NO = IBIMS103B.DEAL_NO AND s112b.MTR_DCD = IBIMS103B.MTR_DCD AND s112b.JDGM_DCD = IBIMS103B.JDGM_DCD AND s112b.RK = 1 AND IBIMS103B.LAST_YN = 'Y'
